parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description:
The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

Use the client to generate the value, but you must ensure that it is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: Force
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to delete the route entries associated with the Express Connect instance.

*   **true**: forcefully deletes the snapshot
*   **false**

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the Express Connect instance is deployed. Call the [DescribeRegion](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/vpc/developer-reference/api-vpc-2016-04-28-describeregions?spm=a2c63.p38356.0.i2) operation to query the region list.

parameters.name: RouterInterfaceId
parameters.description: The ID of the Express Connect instance.
